title: Smith & Jones Architects
desc: This was a project for a mock architectural firm that incorporated responsive web design, pre-processors, and DOM.
highlights: Project was built solo over the course of 1 week
Solely responsible for implementation of markup and styling design
Utilized Less compiler to add mixins for all device sizes

title: Wunderlist 2.0 API
desc: This project was a database based off of the Wunderlist task management app.
highlights: Collaborated remotely with a team of 3 Web Developers over 1 week
Solely responsible for building out the backend endpoints and deployment
Utilized JSON Web Tokens and bcrypt to handle authorization
